## doUntil() function

The opposite of [doWhilst()](./promizr.dowhilst.md)<!-- -->. Calls the `task` function until the `test` function returns `true`<!-- -->.

Note: `test` is called after the first task.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function doUntil<T>(task: AsyncTask<T>, test: (res: T) => boolean | Promise<boolean>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  task | [AsyncTask](./promizr.asynctask.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The task to execute while <code>test</code> fails |
|  test | (res: T) =&gt; boolean \| Promise&lt;boolean&gt; | The function that test the result of <code>task</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
